# Certificate Specification Template

This template is used to provide the necessary details for creating a new certificate model or version. Fill in the sections below with the required information from the specification document. The agent will use this to generate the certificate code following the workflows in `certificate-copilot-instructions.instructions.md`.

pdf type: [e.g., "TEMPLATE", "GENERAL"]

available on 1177: [true/false]

certificate type: [e.g., FK7804]

activation date: [e.g., 2024-06-01]

version: [e.g., V2 or leave blank for new]

certificate spec: [copy paste from Confluence includes all specs]

additional information: [any other relevant details or context]
